title: Handicrafts of India (Travancore)
creator_credit: A. Bhaskar Rao, Ezra Mir and Films Division, Government of India
brief_description: Leaves of tress, buffalo horns and multi-colored sand and shells from the beach at Cape Comorin are some of the simple materials which the gifted craftsmen of Travancore deftly turn into beautiful and fascinating handicrafts. The film also shows lace manufacture depicting the work of the men, women and children of Travancore.
